verses.verse: And the lot <WH1486> of the children <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130> fell <WH3318> <WH8799> from Yarden <WH3383> by Yericho <WH3405>, unto the water <WH4325> of Yericho <WH3405> on the east <WH4217>, to the wilderness <WH4057> that goeth up <WH5927> <WH8802> from Yericho <WH3405> throughout mount <WH2022> Beit-El <WH1008>,
And goeth out <WH3318> <WH8804> from Beit-El <WH1008> to Luz <WH3870>, and passeht along <WH5674> <WH8804> unto the borders <WH1366> of Archi <WH757> to Ataroth <WH5852>,

And goeth down <WH3381> <WH8804> westward <WH3220> to the coast <WH1366> of Japhleti <WH3311>, unto the coast <WH1366> of Bethhoron <WH1032> the nether <WH8481>, and to Gezer <WH1507>: and the goings out <WH8444> thereof are at the sea <WH3220>.
So the children <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130>, M'nasheh <WH4519> and Efrayim <WH669>, took their inheritance <WH5157> <WH8799>.

And the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669> according to their families <WH4940> was thus: even the border <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> on the east side <WH4217> was Atarothaddar <WH5853>, unto Bethhoron <WH1032> the upper <WH5945>;

And the border <WH1366> went out <WH3318> <WH8804> toward the sea <WH3220> to Michmethah <WH4366> on the north side <WH6828>; and the border <WH1366> went about <WH5437> <WH8738> eastward <WH4217> unto Taanathshiloh <WH8387>, and passed <WH5674> <WH8804> by it on the east <WH4217> to Janohah <WH3239>;

And it went down <WH3381> <WH8804> from Janohah <WH3239> to Ataroth <WH5852>, and to Naarath <WH5292>, and came <WH6293> <WH8804> to Yericho <WH3405>, and went out <WH3318> <WH8804> at Yarden <WH3383>.

The border <WH1366> went out <WH3212> <WH8799> from Tappuah <WH8599> westward <WH3220> unto the river <WH5158> Kanah <WH7071>; and the goings out <WH8444> thereof were at the sea <WH3220>. This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669> by their families <WH4940>.

And the separate <WH3995> cities <WH5892> for the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669> were among <WH8432> the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, all the cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.

And they drave not out <WH3423> <WH8689> the Kanahanites <WH3669> that dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Gezer <WH1507>: but the Kanahanites <WH3669> dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> among <WH7130> the Efrayimites <WH669> unto this day <WH3117>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8802> under tribute <WH4522>.
